docket_entries.description: COMPLAINT as to Bobbi A. Constantine (1). (mab)[1:17-mj-00110-DJS]

Text Minute Entry for proceedings (1:31PM-1:41PM) held before Magistrate Judge Daniel J. Stewart: Initial Appearance as to Bobbi A. Constantine held on 3/20/2017. Appearances: AUSA Jeff Coffman, Jay Hernandez, Esq. and ASL Interpreter Christina Kelley. CRD swears in the Interpreter. Atty Hernandez advises that he has not been retained, but is appearing for purposes of this proceeding for today. Defendant is advised of her charges, rights, maximum penalties and given a copy of the Complaint. Government moves for detention (risk of flight, danger to community). Defendant waives a Detention Hearing and Preliminary Hearing, but reserves her right to request those hearings in the future. Defendant is remanded. (Court Reporter: Theresa Casal/CRD: Maria Blunt). (mab)[1:17-mj-00110-DJS]
ORDER APPROVING WAIVER OF PRELIMINARY HEARING as to Bobbi A. Constantine. Signed by Magistrate Judge Daniel J. Stewart on 3/23/2017. (mab)[1:17-mj-00110-DJS]
ORDER APPOVING WAIVER OF DETENTION HEARING as to Bobbi A. Constantine. Signed by Magistrate Judge Daniel J. Stewart on 3/23/2017. (mab)[1:17-mj-00110-DJS]

TEXT NOTICE as to Bobbi A. Constantine: An Attorney Representation Hearing is set for 5/10/2017 at 2:00 PM in Albany, NY before Magistrate Judge Daniel J. Stewart. Defendant is to appear with counsel. Government is not required to appear. (mab)[1:17-mj-00110-DJS]
Letter Request filed by Theresa Suozzi, Esq. requesting to withdraw as counsel for Defendant in this matter. (mab)[1:17-mj-00110-DJS]

Text Minute Entry for proceedings (2:27PM-2:40PM) held before Magistrate Judge Daniel J. Stewart: Attorney Representation Hearing as to Bobbi A. Constantine held on 5/10/2017. Appearances: Defendant Bobbi A. Constantine; Theresa Suozzi, Esq.; ASL Interpreter Christina Kelley. Government not required to appear. CRD swears in the Interpreter. The Courts seals the proceeding and the transcript of the proceeding. Atty Suozzi is terminated as counsel for Defendant. The Court will appoint CJA counsel. (Court Reporter: Lisa Tennyson/CRD: Maria Blunt). (mab)[1:17-mj-00110-DJS]
Attorney update in case as to Bobbi A. Constantine. Attorney Theresa M. Suozzi terminated. (mab)[1:17-mj-00110-DJS]

CJA 20 Appointment of Attorney James A. Resila for Bobbi A. Constantine. Refer to the Court's website: http://www.nynd.uscourts.gov/cja.cfm for comprehensive information relating to court appointed representation. Attorneys are reminded that CJA vouchers are to be submitted to the court no later than 45 days after the final disposition of the case, unless good cause is shown. Please refer to Appendix II of the CJA Plan (Guidelines for Submitting Claims for Reimbursement Pursuant to the Criminal Justice Act of the Northern District of New York). Signed by Magistrate Judge Daniel J. Stewart on 5/12/2017. (mab)[1:17-mj-00110-DJS]

docket_entries.description: TEXT NOTICE OF CHANGE OF PLEA HEARING as to Bobbi A. Constantine (1:17-cr-299 MAD): A Change of Plea Hearing is set for 11/22/2017 at 11:30 AM in Albany before U.S. District Judge Mae A. D'Agostino. (ban)[1:17-mj-00110-DJS]
Letter from James A. Resila as to Bobbi A. Constantine requesting an Order that a Pre-Plea PSI Report be prepared (Resila, James)[1:17-mj-00110-DJS]
CLERK'S CORRECTION OF DOCKET ENTRY: Docket No. 18 (Letter) was deleted from the docket as it was a duplicate submission of Docket No. 17. (ban)[1:17-mj-00110-DJS]

TEXT ORDER as to Bobbi A. Constantine Denying[17] Letter Request filed by Bobbi A. Constantine: It is hereby ORDERED that the defendant's request for a pre-plea PSI Report is DENIED. Signed by U.S. District Judge Mae A. D'Agostino on 10/30/2017. (ban)[1:17-mj-00110-DJS]

TEXT Minute Entry for Arraignment/Waiver and Plea Hearing as to Bobbi A. Constantine held on 11/22/2017 before U.S. District Judge Mae A. D'Agostino:Appearances by Jeffrey Coffman, AUSA for the Government, with US Postal Inspector Donahue; James Resila, Esq. (CJA) for the defendant; American Sign Language Interpreter Christina Kelley; and PO Hart; The defendant is sworn, advised of rights, maximum penalties, and questioned by the Court; The Waiver of Indictment is executed by the defendant and defense counsel; The Court accepts the defendant's waiver of indictment; A written plea agreement is handed up for filing; Plea Agreement Accepted as to Bobbi A. Constantine; Information 1:17-cr-299 MAD is handed up for filing; Plea entered by Bobbi A. Constantine (1) Guilty Count 1; The defendant acknowledges and admits to the forfeiture allegation; The Court accepts the defendant's plea of Guilty and admission to the forfeiture allegations; The Court directs probation to prepare and submit a presentence investigation report; Sentencing is set for December 22, 2017 at 11:30 a.m. in Albany before Judge D'Agostino; Defendant Remanded. (Court Reporter Theresa Casal, CRD Britney Norton [Time 11:42 a.m. - 12:45 p.m.]) (ban)
WAIVER OF INDICTMENT as to Bobbi A. Constantine. (ban)
INFORMATION as to Bobbi A. Constantine (1) count 1 with Forfeiture Allegations. (ban)
PLEA AGREEMENT as to Bobbi A. Constantine. (ban)

GUIDELINE ORDER as to Bobbi A. Constantine: The Sentencing is reset for 1/4/2018 at 11:30 AM in Albany before U.S. District Judge Mae A. D'Agostino. Government Sentencing Memo Deadline 12/14/2017, Defendant Sentencing Memo Deadline 12/14/2017. Signed by U.S. District Judge Mae A. D'Agostino on 11/22/2017. (ban)
